payment_card_header: kGuide - Start using, or unsubscribe, at any time, no extra fees
kGuide_features1: Create onboarding tours with no-code drag and drop.
kGuide_features2: i18n support for English and Japanese
kGuide_features3: Support for all Kintone fields, dropdowns and menus
kGuide_features4: Permissions based guide creation. Limit guide creation to App Admins
kGuide_features5: No App limitation, no user limitations.
kGuide_features7: A security review before installation can be conducted. Please contact us via email.
contact_form_error: There was an error submitting the form. Please try again.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

kintoneDomain.invalid: Please enter a valid Kintone domain

subscriptionSuccess.title: Subscription Successful
subscriptionSuccess.confirmation: You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
subscriptionSuccess.noData: No subscription data available. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.

nextSteps.step1: An email will be sent to {email}
nextSteps.step2: The email will contain a download link for the kGuide Plugin in .zip format, and your secret key.
nextSteps.step3: In your Kintone environment, install the plugin on the Kintone Administration page.
nextSteps.step4: Then, install the plugin to as many Apps as you want.
nextSteps.step5: On the App's plugin settings page, click the cog wheel.
nextSteps.step6: Enter your secret key from the email into the subscription key field.
nextSteps.step7: Click on "Create Repository App" to create the repository for guides. This will create a new Kintone App, and only needs to be done once.
nextSteps.step8: Update your App settings, and create your first guide.
nextSteps.step9: Contact customer support at any time at admin@seanbase.com or via the Customer Support Button on the Plugin Configuration Settings Screen.

subscriptionSuccess.stripePortalInfo: You can manage your subscription, update your payment method, and view your billing history through our customer portal.
